name: @atomiton/typescript-config
description: Shared TypeScript configuration for Atomiton packages
author: Atomiton

scripts.lint: echo 'No linting needed for config-only package'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'No linting fixes needed for config-only package'
scripts.typecheck: echo 'No TypeScript to check for config-only package'
scripts.test:unit: vitest run --passWithNoTests || echo "No unit tests for config-only package"
scripts.test:smoke: mkdir -p test-results && vitest run 'smoke' --passWithNoTests --reporter=json > test-results/speed-report.json || echo "No smoke tests yet"
scripts.test:e2e: echo "No E2E tests for this package"
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:smoke && pnpm test:benchmark && pnpm test:e2e
